text: nheritance - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Bulbar palsy - Constipation - Diarrhea - Dilated cardiomyopathy - Distal muscle weakness - EMG: myopathic abnormalities - Facial palsy - Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy - Hyporeflexia of lower limbs - Late-onset proximal muscle weakness - Neck muscle weakness - Phenotypic variability - Respiratory insufficiency due to muscle weakness - Restrictive heart failure - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom
